                         "Alveolar Macrophages" = "#FF4D6D",

## Load metadata
The data used in this Rmarkdown document comes from **SCGTEST_32+33** dataset.
```{r}
# Load all metadata information
metadata <- read.csv(path_project_metadata)

# Merging metadata tables
metadata <- metadata %>% 
  filter((subproject == "SCGTEST_32" | subproject == "SCGTEST_33")
         & tissue == "Lung"
         & ( sample_protocol == "Fresh" | sample_protocol == "Fix&Cut_24h"))

print("Libraries/Samples metadata")
DT::datatable(metadata, options = list(scrollX = TRUE))
```


```{r}
# Load Seurat object
seurat_obj <- readRDS(here::here("03_clustering_annotation/results/R_objects/FIXnCUT_MouseLung_fixed_clustering_annotation_cleaned.rds"))
seurat_obj

seurat_obj$sample_protocol <- factor(x = seurat_obj$sample_protocol,
                                    levels = c("Fresh", "Fixed"))

seurat_obj$celltypes <- factor(x = seurat_obj$celltypes,
                                    levels = c("T cells", "NK cells", "Monocytes", "Macrophages Apoe+", 
                                               "Alveolar Macrophages", "Monocyte-derived DCs", "B cells", 
                                               "Fibroblasts", "Pericytes", "Lymphatic Endothelial cells",
                                               "Arterial cells", "Vein cells",  "Capillary aerocyte (aCap) cells",
                                               "Capillary general (gCap) cells", "Bipotent Capillary cells", "Pneumocytes Type I", "Pneumocytes Type II",
                                               "Club cells", "Neutrophils","Cycling cells"))

# Remove Neutrophils

cells_to_remove <- c("Neutrophils")
seurat_obj_c <- subset(seurat_obj, idents = cells_to_remove, invert = TRUE)
seurat_obj_c$celltypes <- as.factor(as.character(seurat_obj_c$celltypes))

seurat_obj_c$celltypes <- factor(x = seurat_obj_c$celltypes,
                                    levels = c("T cells", "NK cells", "Monocytes", "Macrophages Apoe+", 
                                               "Alveolar Macrophages", "Monocyte-derived DCs", "B cells",
                                                "Fibroblasts", "Pericytes", "Lymphatic Endothelial cells",
                                               "Arterial cells", "Vein cells",  "Capillary aerocyte (aCap) cells",
                                               "Capillary general (gCap) cells", "Bipotent Capillary cells", "Pneumocytes Type I", "Pneumocytes Type II",
                                               "Club cells", "Cycling cells"))
```

# QC metrics
```{r fig.height=4, fig.width=10}
VlnPlot(seurat_obj,
        features = c("nCount_RNA", "nFeature_RNA", "pct_mt"),
        split.by = "sample_protocol",
        group.by = "library_name",
        pt.size = 0,
        log = TRUE,
        ncol = 3
        ) &
  scale_fill_manual(values = palette_color_factor) &
    theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 0, hjust = 0.5),
          axis.title = element_blank()) &
  stat_summary(fun.y = median, fun.ymin = median, fun.ymax = median,
                 geom='crossbar', colour = "black",
                 width=0.25, position = position_dodge(width = .75))
  #ggpubr::stat_compare_means(ref.group = "Fresh", method = "wilcox.test",
  #                               label = "p.format", label.y.npc = 0.95)

ggsave(paste0(path_r_figs_out, "/MouseLung_fixed_QCmetrics.svg"),
       width = 10, height = 4,
       dpi = 300)
```

# QC metrics by cell-type
```{r}
seurat_metadata <-  seurat_obj@meta.data %>%
  gather(key = "qc_metric", value = "qc_metric_value", c("nCount_RNA", "nFeature_RNA", "pct_mt"))
```


```{r fig.height=7, fig.width=15}
ggplot(seurat_metadata, 
       aes(x = celltypes, y = qc_metric_value, fill = sample_protocol)) +
  introdataviz::geom_split_violin() +
  theme_classic() +
    #ggpubr::stat_compare_means(ref.group = "Fresh", method = "wilcox.test",
     #                            label = "p.signif", label.y.npc = 0.95) + # p.format)
  scale_y_log10() +
  scale_fill_manual(values = palette_color_factor) +
  labs(x = "Cell-types", y="") +
  facet_wrap(~qc_metric, scales = "free_y", nrow = 3) + 
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1, vjust = 0.5),
        axis.text = element_text(size=15),
        axis.title = element_blank(),
        strip.text = element_text(size=15),
          legend.position = "right",
          legend.text = element_text(size = 18),
          legend.title=element_blank())

ggsave(paste0(path_r_figs_out, "/MouseLung_fixed_QCmetricsCell.svg"),
       width = 15, height = 7,
       dpi = 300)
```
